Project description

This project was completed on behalf of a friendâ€™s mom to maintain a local lunch-selling service. As one of my first programming projects, I wanted to learn more about developing GUI applications with persistent data using a database - in this case, MySQL.

Responsibilities

  • Implemented user interaction events
